name: Arcadia (itch) (Nayu, RSinteractive, Defalt_h3l, S_en_A, Paintingdoll, xyurlovax)
name_original: Arcadia (itch) (Nayu, RSinteractive, Defalt_h3l, S_en_A, Paintingdoll, xyurlovax)
description:
Arcadia is a throwback game that serves as a tribute to Arcade titles.

Set in a world far from our own, on the distant planet 'Arcadia' during an earthquake, you play as two miners who try to make a run out of a collapsing mine. A fun High-score game that's short yet addicting.
